item.description:
For those who regularly attend the East Longmeadow meeting, this may also serve as an informal planning session for upcoming events for our group so I hope I will still see you becuase I will need your help in planning some things for the upcoming election!!!Thanks!
Donna






Come meet local candidates and find out how YOU can make a difference. We will be inviting many local Republican, Democrat and Independent candidates for an opportunity to earn your vote on Nov. 2nd. Find out how you can help the candidates that you may be supporting or stop by if you are undecided! Updates will be sent with RSVP's from candidates who will be attending and refreshments will be served. Bring your family and a friend or two as well!!! And don't forget the young voters you may know...this is a great way for them to become involved and educated as well!
item.name: "Candidate Fair" - Meet and Greet
